totalDeductionAmount.description: The total amount of tax deducted by CIS contractors. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalCostOfMaterials.description: The total cost of materials incurred under CIS by the subcontractor across all of the CIS contractors that they worked for. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalGrossAmountPaid.description: The total gross amount paid by CIS contractors. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cisDeductions.description: List of the components that make up the overall deductions.

fromDate.description: CIS start date of a tax year.

toDate.description: CIS end date of a tax year.

contractorName.description: The name of the contractor the subcontractor worked for.

employerRef.description: A unique identifier contractor reference number.

totalDeductionAmount.description: The total amount of tax deducted by a CIS contractor. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalCostOfMaterials.description: The total cost of materials incurred under CIS by the subcontractor. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalGrossAmountPaid.description: The total gross amount paid by a CIS contractor. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

periodData.description: List of the components that make up the overall deductions.

deductionFromDate.description: The From date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year period.

deductionToDate.description: The To date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year period.

deductionAmount.description: The deducted amount relating to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfMaterials.description: The cost of materials incurred for CIS.

grossAmountPaid.description: CIS deductions gross amount paid related to self-employment. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

submissionDate.description: The date the deduction was submitted.

submissionId.description: The unique identifier for the submission.

links.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
